requirement_tested: Frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A new user named Sarah exploring the vocabulary website.
user_goal: Sarah wants to view her personalized dashboard after logging in.

narrative_steps.title: Initial Page Load
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and waits for it to load. She expects to see some initial content fetched from the backend.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The frontend makes a request to /api/data, shows a loading spinner, and populates the page with dynamic content once received.

requirement_tested: Backend server connecting to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: System administrator setting up the backend service.
user_goal: Ensure the backend connects securely to the PostgreSQL database on startup.

narrative_steps.title: Server Initialization
narrative_steps.description: The admin starts the backend server and monitors logs to confirm successful database connection.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server process.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The server reads DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, and DB_NAME from environment variables and establishes a secure connection pool to the PostgreSQL instance.

requirement_tested: User authentication and session management system
user_persona: Returning user John who wants to access his account.
user_goal: John aims to log in and reach the dashboard without issues.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: John enters his credentials into the login form and submits them.
narrative_steps.action: Submit valid email and password via the login form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Credentials are validated, a JWT token is generated, and John is redirected to the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Session Expiry Handling
narrative_steps.description: After being idle for more than 30 minutes, John tries to navigate to another section.
narrative_steps.action: Attempt to access a protected route after session expiration.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: John is automatically redirected to the login screen with a notification about session expiry.

requirement_tested: Dashboard page displaying user progress summary and statistics
user_persona: Regular learner Mia checking her weekly performance.
user_goal: Mia wants to review her progress metrics and visualize trends.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Dashboard Data
narrative_steps.description: Mia logs in and lands on the dashboard where she expects to see her progress overview.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the dashboard page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Data is fetched from /api/dashboard/progress, and key metrics like total words learned and accuracy percentage are displayed with skeleton loaders during fetch.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Charts
narrative_steps.description: Mia hovers over points on the progress chart to get detailed insights.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over elements in the progress visualization chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears showing exact values and dates related to the hovered data point.

requirement_tested: Weekly word delivery system providing 10 new words each week
user_persona: Weekly learner Tom eager to learn new vocabulary.
user_goal: Tom wants to access the freshly delivered set of words every Monday.

narrative_steps.title: Automatic Weekly Delivery
narrative_steps.description: On Monday morning, Tom checks the 'New Words' tab expecting fresh content.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the 'New Words' tab on the dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Ten new words assigned automatically are displayed with definitions, example sentences, and pronunciation guides.

requirement_tested: Avatar selection feature allowing users to choose and customize their profile avatar
user_persona: New user Lily personalizing her profile.
user_goal: Lily wants to select an avatar that represents her personality.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Avatar Gallery
narrative_steps.description: Lily navigates to the settings menu and chooses to update her avatar.
narrative_steps.action: Open the avatar selection modal from the settings menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A scrollable gallery of unlocked avatars is loaded from /api/user/avatar/select and displayed in a responsive grid.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting an Avatar
narrative_steps.description: Lily picks an avatar she likes and confirms her choice.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a preferred avatar thumbnail.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Her selected_avatar_id is updated in the database, and the chosen avatar is reflected across the UI.

requirement_tested: Waiting room with simple game for user engagement during loading periods
user_persona: Impatient user Noah waiting for a quiz to load.
user_goal: Noah wants to pass time by playing a quick game while waiting.

narrative_steps.title: Starting the Waiting Room Game
narrative_steps.description: While waiting for the crossword puzzle to load, Noah sees a matching card game and decides to play.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for main content to load, triggering display of waiting room game.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A 4x4 card-matching game appears with face-down cards arranged neatly, ready for interaction.

narrative_steps.title: Playing the Matching Game
narrative_steps.description: Noah flips two cards hoping they match.
narrative_steps.action: Click two different cards consecutively.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: If matched, the cards remain face-up; otherwise, they flip back. Time and score are tracked.

narrative_steps.title: Finishing the Game
narrative_steps.description: Noah completes all matches and sees his final score.
narrative_steps.action: Complete all pairs in the matching game.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Final time/score is displayed, offering options to replay or return to the previous screen. Result saved to games_history.

requirement_tested: Homepage with navigation to all main sections
user_persona: First-time visitor Emma exploring the site.
user_goal: Emma wants to quickly find various sections of the website.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Through Sections
narrative_steps.description: Emma clicks on different links in the navigation bar to explore the site.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Activities' link in the top navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The Activities page loads smoothly without a full page refresh, thanks to client-side routing.

narrative_steps.title: Using Homepage CTAs
narrative_steps.description: Emma clicks a CTA button on the hero banner to dive into the learning experience.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Explore Activities' CTA on the homepage hero banner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Since Emma is logged in, she is directed straight to the activities overview page.

requirement_tested: Five distinct activity pages for different quiz and word game types
user_persona: Curious student Alex wanting to try different word games.
user_goal: Alex wants to explore and start playing various quiz formats.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing an Activity
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the activities page and sees several game options.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the 'Crossword Puzzle' card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The card elevates slightly with a subtle shadow effect, indicating it's clickable.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Crossword Puzzle
narrative_steps.description: Alex clicks on the crossword puzzle card to begin playing.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Crossword Puzzle' activity card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The crossword puzzle gameplay view loads, showing the grid and clues.

user_persona: Puzzle enthusiast Ben solving a crossword challenge.
user_goal: Ben aims to solve the crossword puzzle accurately.

narrative_steps.title: Filling in Answers
narrative_steps.description: Ben types answers directly into the crossword grid cells.
narrative_steps.action: Type letters into crossword cells following directional rules.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Keystrokes populate adjacent empty squares appropriately, auto-switching to the next clue when current word is filled.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Clues
narrative_steps.description: Ben clicks on a clue to highlight its corresponding row/column.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific clue from the Across or Down list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The associated row/column in the grid is highlighted, focusing the first unfilled letter of that answer.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Puzzle
narrative_steps.description: Ben finishes filling the grid and submits his answers.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button beneath the crossword puzzle.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Entered answers are compared with stored solutions, incorrect entries are highlighted in red, and completion percentage is displayed.

user_persona: Language learner Chloe practicing word formation.
user_goal: Chloe wants to unscramble letters to form the correct word.

narrative_steps.title: Rearranging Letters
narrative_steps.description: Chloe drags letter tiles to arrange them into the correct word.
narrative_steps.action: Drag letter tiles into the submission area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tiles snap magnetically into place near submission slots when released nearby.

narrative_steps.title: Using Hints
narrative_steps.description: Stuck on a word, Chloe uses the hint button for assistance.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Hint' button located at the top-right corner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: One character of the correct answer is revealed, though at the cost of a reduced score multiplier.

narrative_steps.title: Timer Runs Out
narrative_steps.description: Before submitting, the timer runs out unexpectedly.
narrative_steps.action: Let the countdown timer reach zero without making a submission.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The correct answer is displayed along with a feedback message, then proceeds to the next challenge.

user_persona: Student David preparing for a vocabulary test.
user_goal: David wants to practice identifying synonyms and antonyms.

narrative_steps.title: Answering Questions
narrative_steps.description: David selects what he believes is the correct synonym or antonym from multiple choices.
narrative_steps.action: Select a radio option corresponding to the best answer.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Immediate validation occurs, showing a green checkmark for correct answers and advancing to the next question automatically.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Past Answers
narrative_steps.description: Wanting to study further, David enables review mode to revisit earlier questions.
narrative_steps.action: Toggle the 'Review Mode' switch.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Previously attempted questions are accessible again, with past answers preserved for reevaluation.

requirement_tested: Interactive flashcard system for vocabulary review
user_persona: Flashcard user Ella reviewing learned terms.
user_goal: Ella wants to flip through flashcards and mark mastery levels.

narrative_steps.title: Flipping Cards
narrative_steps.description: Ella clicks on a flashcard to reveal its definition.
narrative_steps.action: Click the flashcard currently displayed.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The card performs a smooth 180Â° rotation using CSS transitions to show the reverse side with definition and examples.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Decks
narrative_steps.description: Ella moves to the next flashcard using keyboard shortcuts.
narrative_steps.action: Press the right arrow key.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Seamlessly moves to the subsequent card in the deck, wrapping around at the end.

narrative_steps.title: Marking Mastery
narrative_steps.description: Feeling confident about a term, Ella marks it as mastered.
narrative_steps.action: Tap the 'Got It' button at the bottom of the flashcard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The card is flagged as mastered, influencing future repetitions in spaced learning cycles.

user_persona: Test-taker Frank working on grammar exercises.
user_goal: Frank wants to complete fill-in-the-blank sentences and receive immediate feedback.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Answers
narrative_steps.description: Frank fills in the blanks with what he thinks fits grammatically.
narrative_steps.action: Type words into the blank input fields within the sentence.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Basic regex validation prevents invalid characters. Instant feedback is shown below each field upon leaving it.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Exercise
narrative_steps.description: After completing all blanks, Frank submits the exercise for evaluation.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit Exercise' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All blanks are evaluated collectively, returning a detailed breakdown of correct/incorrect responses and adjusting difficulty accordingly.

requirement_tested: Blog section for vocabulary-related articles and updates
user_persona: Knowledge seeker Grace interested in language tips.
user_goal: Grace wants to read informative blog posts and search for specific topics.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Articles
narrative_steps.description: Grace clicks on a blog post preview to read the full article.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a blog post title in the index view.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The complete article content loads asynchronously, parsing markdown into semantic HTML with proper formatting.

narrative_steps.title: Searching Blog Posts
narrative_steps.description: Looking for something specific, Grace uses the search bar to filter posts.
narrative_steps.action: Enter keywords into the blog search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Article previews are filtered in real-time based on matches in titles, excerpts, or tags metadata.
